BankNotes - Class in Model
The Model.BankNotes class acts as the money denominations being paid or the denominations currently being owned by a whole class It is vital for the transactions and maintenance being done to the vending machine
BankNotes() - Constructor for class Model.BankNotes
Constructor method that allows the initiation of an instance of the Model.BankNotes class with all denominations set to 0
BankNotes(int, int, int, int, int, int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class Model.BankNotes
Constructor method that allows the initiation of an instance of the Model.BankNotes class
BillInsert - Class in View
 
BillInsert() - Constructor for class View.BillInsert
 
buildProduct(int[]) - Method in class Model.SpecialVM
buildProduct is the method that allows the user to create the product to be displayed to the user
buildProduct(int[]) - Method in class Model.VendingMachine
buildProduct is the method that allows the user to create the product to be displayed to the user.
buyCustom(VendingMachine) - Method in class Controller.Controller
buyCustom is the method that takes in the quantity of each product from the special vending machine custom form and puts it into an array (Qty)
BuyCustom(BankNotes, int[]) - Method in class Model.SpecialVM
BuyCustom method allows the user to input multiple items and create a special product based on the combination of items that the user inputs and subtracts from their money accordingly
BuyCustom(BankNotes, int[]) - Method in class Model.VendingMachine
BuyCustom method allows the user to input multiple items and create a special product based on the combination of items that the user inputs and subtracts from their money accordingly To be Overidden in SpecialVM
buyItem(VendingMachine) - Method in class Controller.Controller
buyItem is the method that allows the user to buy items from the vending machine
BuyItem(BankNotes, int, int) - Method in class Model.VendingMachine
BuyItem is the method that facilitates the purchase of an item; from the stock being depleted, receiving the money from the buyer, and returning adequate change to the buyer.
BuyMenu - Class in View
 
BuyMenu() - Constructor for class View.BuyMenu
 
buyPremade(VendingMachine) - Method in class Controller.Controller
buyPremade allows the user to purchase a premade item via a function in the vending machine by building the Qty[] array used to determine the amount of items being bought
